import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const DifficultyBar = ({}) => { const bsDifficultyCols = 'col-3 col-md-2 col-lg-2 col-xl-1' const path = console.log('difficultybar: path:',window.location.pathname) const CustomLink = (to, text) => { const path = window.location.pathname return ( {text} ) } return( <>
Select difficulty:
Intermediate
Extreme
Custom
) } export default DifficultyBar
